  Kay

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
      .hmmessage P  {  margin:0px;  padding:0px  }  body.hmmessage  {  FONT-SIZE: 10pt;  FONT-FAMILY:Tahoma  }     I isten to a station here that features John Tesh's "Intelligence for your life". Something to think about, the raw audio file I'm using was recorded back in 2005, before Tesh's show came on the radio here. 
 
 Frank-S
